wisheshayen 2010 - 2011 warshawala upadhi samath wishala pirisak me wanawita abhyasalabhin lesa bandawagena athi thaththwayak thula meya thawath uga්ra wi atha. 2012/07/04 dina ewana lada lipiya hethuwen rata pura upadhidharin 3000k pamana asadharanayata lakwa atha.wisheshayen me wanawita ema wasarawala upadhidharinda sammukha parikshana sandaha (ape්ral, mayi, juni masawala)penisita athi atharaowunta pathwim lipi labadima sandaha disthi්rak lekamwaru (mathara, kaluthara disthi්rakka aadi) athsan kota lipi pawa sakas atha.
